body:
We use Google Analytics to collect information about how you use the service. This information helps us to update and improve the service.

Google Analytics stores information about:

- the pages you visit
- how long you spend on each page
- how you got to the service
- what you click on while you’re using the service

(i) We don’t allow Google to use or share our analytics data.

You can [opt out of Google Analytics cookies](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout).
cookie_description: A randomly generated reference is used to identify unique users and inform referring sites, visitor and session counts
heading: Google Analytics cookie
